label: Hover your mouse here for instructions
tooltip:
1- Save settings before enabling the script 
2- Enabling the script will open a black window. DO NOT close it. 
3- The black window will display CTT's and Mentions (if enabled) 
 but is also needed to monitor twitter. 
4- If you make changes to settings, after saving: clip on Open Twitter Monitor button. 
5- If the script is set to Live Only, and you enable the script before going live, click on Open Twitter Monitor button. 
6- Remember to Reset every time you start your stream.

LiveOnly.label: Only when live
LiveOnly.tooltip: Command is only active when stream is live

WhoIscmd.label: Command to give twitch account
WhoIscmd.tooltip:
When the bot gets a twitter account, it needs to ask you for its corresponding twitch account.
This is the command in which you give the answer: ![command] [twitter account] [twitch account]

Resetcmd.label: Reset Command
Resetcmd.tooltip: Command to reset who has received points. Needs to be called every time you start streaming

ResetBtn.label: Reset
ResetBtn.tooltip: Reset CTT List (instead of Reset Command)

StartUpdatecmd.label: Open CTT Update command
StartUpdatecmd.tooltip:
The script to update CTT list opens automatically. 
However, if you closed it by mistake, and want to reopen it you can use this command. 
 (Or disable and enable the script!)

GetCTTBtn.label: Open Twitter Monitor
GetCTTBtn.tooltip: Same as Open CTT Update command

CTTMsg.label: CTT message
CTTMsg.tooltip:
Message included in Tweet to search for. 
 Separate key words/phrases with a , (comma). (search is based on AND not OR)  
 Do not copy paste the message into here, retype it to avoid errors. 
 Do not leave empty! 
 First word/phrase is used for the Mentions notification unless there is only one word/phrase (no commas). 
 Example: typing @Twitch will mark all tweets containing @Twitch as CTT. 
	typing: @Twitch,Join Stream  will mark all tweets containing @Twitch and "Join Stream" as CTT, while display tweets only containg @Twitch as mentions. 
	typing: @Twitch,Join,Stream will mark all tweets containg @Twitch,Join, and Stream as CTT
 IF CHANGED: REOPEN TWITTER MONITOR AFTER SAVING
